name: My Computer (Quinn McNeil)
description:
You need to answer those emails! Log onto the interrnet and sort them out!

all of you're important info is on your trusty notice board, just got to find the right screen...

Left click -> press a key or grab mouse

Right click -> drop the mouse

W A S D -> move your hand around

Code by Quinn Mcneil - twitter.com/QuinnBug

Art by PatsyPeach - twitch.tv/patsypeach
